title: Joined AI Grid
content: Contributed as a member at AI Grid.

title: Started Internship at Sonova Group
content: Excited to join Sonova Group as a Data Scientist intern in Lower Saxony, Germany.

title: Joined TIB as Student Assistant
content: Started working at TIB – Leibniz-Informationszentrum Technik und Naturwissenschaften on Data Science and Digital Libraries.

title: Started Master's Degree
content: Began my Master's in Computer Engineering at Leibniz Universität Hannover.
